snippet.title: Bold Blade Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Bold Blade launch trailer,  the bitesize pixel art action RPG where your sword keeps getting bigger! Pursuing the legend of a sword powerful enough to fell mountains, you journeyed to a remote island populated by demons.

Coming soon on Steam, add it to your wishlist now!
http://store.steampowered.com/app/749110/Bold_Blade/
